system.availability: Projects illusions of the user during movement, and causes user to fade into their surroundings when still. Imposes -20 to BS and WS Tests to target user. When stationary grants +30 Concealment and additional -20 to be hit with ranged weapons.
system.cost: A Rare Xenotech Item, They are Good Craftsmanship by default, with no Poor or Common Craftsmanship versions. (if there are, they're probably fake)
